page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The area which we are covering is mostly farmland.There is no industry at all in the area,most residents being professional people.The area includes the village of{Bowdon}and part of{Bowdon Vale . It covers mainly Bowdon and the residential part of Bowdon Vale. The{River Bollin}meanders through the area.The area is bisected by the M56 which runs from Chester to Manchester.Rostherne Mere is in the South West corner of the block and its North East bank is covered by forest land. The area is dominated by{St.Mary's {Church},which was built on high land overlooking the start of the Cheshire Plain.
